pages.title: Kill Mob
pages.text: Send your companion to hunt and kill specific mobs.$(br2)$(li)$(bold)Vanilla mobs:$() $(thing)"Kill 5 zombies"$(li)$(bold)Modded mobs:$() $(thing)"Kill the blaze"$() â€” auto-detects modded entity IDs$(li)Specify a count or leave open-ended$(li)Companion searches for the target mob in range$(li)Engages in melee combat, auto-equips best weapon$(br2)Earns $(bold)10 XP$() per kill.$(br2)The companion will hunt until the requested count is reached, or you tell it to stop.
